{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR841N |revision=v1.5 |series=N300 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7130 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=ST25P64V6P |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622ETP-5 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |wi1_module=TP-LINK TL-WN861N v1 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5416 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2122 |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_cpu=yes |lan_speed=100M |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6063 |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}''300Mbps Wireless N Router''
[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR841N Product page] On [http://itbbs.pconline.com.cn/network/12654721.html this] hardware table. The table states the device has 8MB of Flash. [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=74112&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=135 On the DD-WRT forums (pics)]
